original_title: คะนึงถึงทุกครา
overview: Met, a high-school boy deprived of sensations for which he used to live, attempts to seek for a new motive to trudge through life by falling for his well-adored classmate, Chin. But his fervid craving for such a love—his unfeasible, reckless fantasy—winds him back to the crux of his profound loneliness that originated in his early childhood.
title: Us, Being and Time
